name: awaken
description: Allows one inactive card to activate

name: blocker
description: Causes the target enemy card to be blocked

name: counter
description: Disables aby opponent ability for 1 round

name: cycling
description: Can be moved from hand to discard and be replaced with a new card

name: equip
description: Can be attached to a creature to grant abilities

name: goad
description: Can take cause enemy to attack it instead of other creatures

name: haste
description: Can attack twice in a turn

name: instant
description: Can be played on the turn it arrives to table

name: rend
description: If attack is larger than target defence, the excess is damage is dealt to the player

name: resurrect
description: Returns latest card in discard deck to hand
